input_str: TL;DR We’re rolling out a new LeaverBuster system to help reduce the frequency of AFKS and leavers that is also significantly more severe in ranked games. **This system will only penalize frequent leavers/afkers**, although players will now get a one time notification in their first leave after the system goes live. --- LeaverBuster is our system for detecting players who frequently leave games or AFK.
